description: Nestled in the heart of Arabian Ranches 3, Ruba offers an exquisite three-bedroom townhouse that epitomizes luxury and comfort. This residence is perfectly designed for families seeking a blend of elegance and space. The townhouse boasts a generous outdoor area, perfect for relaxation and entertainment. The interior is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring high-quality finishes and modern aesthetics that create a welcoming ambiance. The open-plan living and dining areas are bathed in natural light, enhancing the sense of space and serenity. Each bedroom is a haven of tranquility, providing residents with a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. Residents of Ruba will enjoy access to a wide range of amenities within Arabian Ranches 3, including a world-class golf course, parks, swimming pools, and a fitness center. The community also offers excellent connectivity to Dubai’s major landmarks and business districts, making it an ideal location for those who seek convenience without compromising on lifestyle. This townhouse represents a remarkable opportunity to live in one of Dubai’s most sought-after communities, offering a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and accessibility. breadcrumbs: Dubai Townhouses > Arabian Ranches 3 > Ruba > Bayut - LP003060
description: Discover the epitome of community living in this beautiful 3-bedroom townhouse nestled in the vibrant neighborhood of Ruba, Arabian Ranches 3. Offering a back-to-back layout, this residence ensures privacy and tranquility, making it a perfect sanctuary for your family. Step inside to find a spacious floor plan that seamlessly blends comfort with elegance. The living areas are bathed in natural light, enhancing the serene and welcoming atmosphere that pervades the home. Each bedroom is thoughtfully designed, providing ample space and promising personal comfort and style. This home is not just about aesthetics; functionality is at its core. It is chiller free, meaning you can enjoy a cool indoor environment all year round without the worry of additional charges. The modern kitchen is equipped with top-of-the-line appliances and offers plenty of cabinets to ensure that all your storage needs are met. Ruba at Arabian Ranches 3 is renowned for its family-oriented environment. The community boasts a plethora of amenities, including swimming pools, parks, and sports courts, all designed to foster a healthy and active lifestyle. The neighborhood is a safe haven where children can play outdoors and adults can enjoy leisurely walks along scenic paths. Living here, you are also well-connected to major highways, facilitating easy access to Dubai’s business districts and entertainment venues. Top-notch schools and health care facilities are just a stone's throw away, ensuring every need is catered to. This property is more than just a house; it's a home waiting to be filled with new memories. Whether you're entertaining guests or enjoying a quiet evening with your family, this home adapts to all your moods and occasions. Embrace a life where your family's comfort and well-being stand at the forefront in a community that echoes luxury and style.

description: McCone properties are proud to be exclusively listing this spacious one-bedroom apartment in the heart of Downtown Dubai. Outstanding Features:- 1 Bedroom- 2 Bathrooms include 1 ensuite- BUA: 871.98 sq. ft- Built-in Wardrobes- Kitchen Equipped- Parking - Fully FurnishedAmenities:- 24-hour security and concierge services- State-of-the-art fitness center- Swimming pool- Dedicated parking space- Lush landscaped gardensNearby Attractions:- Burj Khalifa- Dubai Mall- Dubai Opera- Emaar Boulevard- Numerous fine dining options, cafes, and shopsThe Residence 7, also known as Burj Residence 7, is a 40-floor high-rise apartment building that features a collection of 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments and podium villas. It is one of the nine residential towers in the apartment complex called The Residences or Burj Residences, a luxury project of Emaar Properties. The project was handed over in the year 2007, boasting 1,056 residential units, a library, a daycare, a fitness centre and squash courts. Securing an ideal location in the city’s favourite area, Downtown Dubai, Burj Residence Tower 7 offers spectacular views of Dubai’s most popular landmark – Burj Khalifa. Residents of Tower 7 also enjoy proximity to recreational spots such as The Dubai Mall, Souk Al Bahar and Dubai Aquarium. For more information regarding this property, Ansar Mahmood.

location: Indigo Tower, JLT Cluster D, Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT), Dubai
breadcrumbs: Dubai Apartments > Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT) > JLT Cluster D > Indigo Tower > Bayut - RENT-3BR78
description: About Indigo Tower JLTIndigo Tower, also known as Indigo Tower JLT, is a 35-storey, mixed-use building located in Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT) Cluster D. The building houses 272 luxury apartments available in studios, penthouses, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom configurations. Additionally, there are 68 modern offices with sleek and decent interior finishing as well as several shops available in the building. The residential and commercial floors in the tower have different entrances to ensure ease of access and privacy for all. The building offers a luxurious swimming pool for adults and a separate kid’s pool, a shared gymnasium and steam room. The high-rise structure features multiple elevators to cater to residents and professionals. Additionally, there is a 24-hour security service, a well-designed lobby and an on-site maintenance team available. The tower is located close to Sheikh Zayed Road and First Al Khail Road. Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT) is a district that consists of 78 high-rise buildings located in 26 clusters denoted with each letter of the alphabet. Each cluster, also called plot, contains three buildings. The community is a mix of commercial and residential structures which look over scenic lakes. The district is also one of the 10 most searched areas as per the Dubai real estate market report for 2020. There are several other mixed-use and residential buildings for those interested in apartments for sale in JLT. description: VIVID Realty presents this 2 bedroom apartment in Al Andalus, Jumeirah Golf Estates. Property Details:- 2.5 bathrooms- BUA : 1,386 sq ft- Laundry room- Extra built-in storage- Master bathroom with his/her sinksSituated on a high floor in the Al Andalus apartment blocks of JGE, this 2 bedroom property has had a large extra storage room added. With an open kitchen and kitchen island, your living, dining and kitchen areas are bathed in bright light from the floor to ceiling balcony doors stretching across length of the walls. Both bedrooms come with en-suites and fitted wardrobes, with the master bedroom featuring his and hers sinks, plus a bath and shower whilst the 2nd bedroom has a singular sink and standing shower. You also benefit from having a large laundry room with ample space to add additional shelving to use for storage if you desire. With top quality restaurants in the clubhouse, a supermarket, mall and various amenities, the community is the perfect place for all people, especially golf aficionados. At Vivid Realty, we're committed to making your real estate dreams a vivid reality. Contact us to learn more and embark on your journey to your dream home.

breadcrumbs: Dubai Townhouses > Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) > Bayut - RENT-TN276
description: ABOUT JUMEIRAH VILLAGE TRIANGLE (JVT)Starting as a ghost town to being one of the most densely populated areas in Dubai, Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) has emerged as one of the most ambitious projects with brilliantly developed plans. Keeping all the demographic challenges into consideration, this freehold, gated community nestles on the northern side of Dubai, towards the coastal areas such as Dubai Marina and JBR. The area is strategically developed between Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) and Al Khail Road (E44), two of the major highways in the UAE, allowing an easier commute to other central locations of the emirate. Jumeirah Village Triangle is another master project of Nakheel Properties after the successful establishment of Jumeirah Village Circle. It features a village-like infrastructure with several plantations along the streets to promote a healthy environment. The residential part of the community is divided into nine districts, featuring more than 13,000 residential options, including villas, townhouses and apartments. Strengthening the reputation of Dubai’s real estate market with its glitzy residential buildings and villas that reflect the modern architecture, this residential development is complemented with premium lifestyle amenities. It offers a comfortable and secure lifestyle for residents. Jumeirah Village Triangle also features a community centre that includes many retail outlets, supermarkets, eateries and entertainment zones where residents can enjoy a thrilling day without having to drive farther away from their homes. Therefore, it is regarded as one of the most family-centric areas in Dubai. description: Immerse yourself in the grandeur of this opulent 5-bedroom villa located in the prestigious Sundials community at Jumeirah Golf Estates. Set on an expansive, extended plot, this residence defines luxury living with its sophisticated finishes and spacious design, ready for immediate occupancy. The villa opens to a grand entryway that seamlessly leads into a vast living area, flooded with natural light from large windows and sliding doors. The decor is crafted with luxury in mind, showcasing refined finishes that create an atmosphere of chic elegance perfect for relaxing and hosting. The gourmet kitchen is a culinary enthusiast’s delight, equipped with high-end appliances, modern cabinetry, and exquisite countertops. It connects to a dining area that is ideal for both cozy family meals and larger social gatherings. All five bedrooms serve as peaceful retreats, each featuring considerable storage space and their own private, contemporary bathrooms. The master bedroom stands out with its expansive walk-in closet and a lavish en-suite bathroom that offers a spa-like ambiance for supreme relaxation. The villa’s substantial plot provides ample space for outdoor enjoyment and is a perfect canvas for a custom garden or pool, enhancing the serene and private setting. Living in Jumeirah Golf Estates means having access to exceptional amenities, including world-class golf facilities, a sophisticated clubhouse, diverse dining options, and extensive fitness centers. This gated community offers a lifestyle of luxury, privacy, and convenience. Now available, this magnificent villa invites you to embrace a superior standard of living in one of Dubai's most elite neighborhoods.

description: RIVIERA, MBR CITYRiviera is one of Azizi’s flagship developments located in Meydan at the heart of Mohammed Bin Rashid City (MBR City) in Dubai. In a prime location, close to Meydan Racecourse, the home of The Dubai World Cup and a variety of sports and leisure facilities, Riviera offers a desirable address and is within close proximity to Downtown Dubai and Dubai International Airport. Inspired by the French Riviera, the iconic mixed-use community will be home to residential apartments, retail outlets and a variety of onsite amenities. Riviera comprises of various mid-rise residential buildings with a variety of retail outlets at ground floor level.  Each individual building will benefit from a swimming pool, landscaped gardens and a gym.  Key attractions will include a beautiful crystal lagoon and beach spanning 2km, a beautiful palm tree lined boulevard and numerous community parks.  Residential properties include studios, one, two and three bedroom apartments offering a variety of different views ranging from orientation towards Downtown Dubai and Burj Khalifa to community pool and canal views.  Riviera will also feature a wide variety of cafes and restaurants, convenience stores and shops.  When fully completed, Riviera will be home to over 20,000 residents including professionals and families. Phase I, II and III are currently under construction. FOR MORE DETAILS CONTACT SAIFULLAH ANSARIView Contact Detail

The community also offers easy access to public transport and boasts some of the best schools in Dubai. This villa represents an exceptional choice for families seeking a luxurious residence in Dubai. It stands as a testament to a blend of urban living, modern conveniences, and mesmerizing lake views.

Here are some nearby attractions and amenities:Location and Nearby:The Beach: A bustling outdoor destination featuring pristine beaches, watersports, a variety of restaurants, cafes, and shops, perfect for leisurely strolls or relaxing afternoons by the waterfront. Dubai Marina Mall: A premier shopping and entertainment destination offering a wide range of retail outlets, dining options, a cinema complex, and family-friendly activities. JBR (Jumeirah Beach Residence): A dynamic waterfront community adjacent to Dubai Marina, known for its scenic promenade, vibrant street life, upscale dining options, and trendy boutiques. Dubai Marina Walk: A picturesque pedestrian promenade lined with cafes, restaurants, and shops, ideal for leisurely walks, jogging, or cycling while enjoying stunning views of the marina. Marina Yacht Club: A world-class marina offering berthing facilities for yachts and boats, as well as a range of water-based activities such as sailing, fishing, and yacht charters. Skydive Dubai: For thrill-seekers, Skydive Dubai offers tandem skydiving experiences with breathtaking views of the Dubai Marina skyline and Palm Jumeirah. Emirates Golf Club: Located nearby, Emirates Golf Club is a prestigious golfing destination featuring two championship courses, a clubhouse, golf academy, and dining options. The Walk at JBR: A lively promenade featuring an array of cafes, restaurants, shops, and street performers, perfect for dining, shopping, and entertainment. Dubai Marina Ferry: Offers scenic ferry rides along the Dubai Marina canal, providing a unique perspective of the waterfront and skyline. Parks and Recreation: Several parks and recreational areas are scattered throughout Dubai Marina, offering green spaces, playgrounds, fitness facilities, and jogging tracks for residents to enjoy outdoor activities and leisure time. Various villas are available at prices suitable for everyone. Al Khawaneej First is a residential area located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It is part of the larger Al Khawaneej community, which is known for its tranquil and family-friendly environment. Here are some key points about Al Khawaneej First Villas:Location: Al Khawaneej is situated in the eastern part of Dubai, offering a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city while still being accessible to major roads and highways. Architecture: The villas in Al Khawaneej First are typically designed with a blend of traditional Arabic and modern architectural styles. They often feature spacious layouts, large gardens, and high-quality finishes. Community Feel: The area is known for its strong sense of community, with many long-term residents and families. It offers a quiet, suburban lifestyle with plenty of green spaces and parks. Amenities: Al Khawaneej First offers various amenities such as schools, mosques, and shopping centers. The proximity to amenities like the Arabian Center and Mirdif City Center makes it convenient for residents to access shopping, dining, and entertainment options. Recreation: There are several parks and recreational areas in and around Al Khawaneej, including the popular Mushrif Park, which offers numerous outdoor activities such as cycling, picnicking, and bird watching. Accessibility: The area is well-connected by road, making it easy to commute to other parts of Dubai. Public transportation options are also available, although private vehicles are commonly used by residents. Educational Institutions: There are several reputable schools and nurseries in the vicinity, catering to the educational needs of families living in the area. Lifestyle: Al Khawaneej First is ideal for those looking for a laid-back and serene lifestyle. It is particularly popular among families and individuals who prefer a more private and spacious living environment.

location: Al Sufouh 1, Al Sufouh, Dubai
breadcrumbs: Dubai Villas > Al Sufouh > Al Sufouh 1 > Bayut - 1019-Vl-R-0217
description: 4 Bedroom villa for rent in Al Sufouh 1Private Swimming Pool Lift Next to Internet City Plot size: 20,999 sq ft  Maid's roomDriver's roomRoof terraceGardenMarble floorWooden panels Closed GarageSpacious GardenClose distance to the Beach, Media City, Supermarket, Madinat Jumeirah. Al Sufouh is a great choice. Nestled along the coastline and just a short drive away from iconic landmarks such as the Burj Khalifa, the neighborhood is a breezy escape. Located close to Al Sufouh Beach, which lives up to its nickname ‘Secret Beach’ thanks to its somewhat hidden location behind a row of palm trees. Take a dip in the shallow, crystal-clear waters, perfect for little ones, or just lie back on the soft white sand and soak up the sunshine. Of course, you can't miss the incredible views of the sail-shaped Burj Al Arab hotel in the distance. Waterfront Al Sufouh is known for the lavish Madinat Jumeirah resort complex, home to Souk Madinat, a recreated ancient Arab bazaar selling carpets, jewelry and perfume, and the Madinat Theatre, which presents musicals and ballet. Traditional wooden boats sail along a man-made waterway past chic bars and smart European and Arab restaurants. Sufouh Public Beach has views of the towering, curved Burj Al Arab hotel.

ABOUT INTERNATIONAL CITY DUBAIInternational City is one of the most affordable housing areas of Dubai’s ever-expanding real estate market. According to Bayut’s Annual Dubai Rental Report 2023, investing in apartments is a popular option with the best rental yield recorded. Investors and end-users can browse the sales transaction analysis for apartments in International City recorded by DLD over the past 12 months. Besides affordable accommodation, residents enjoy various perks of living in Dubai International City. They have access to the grand Dragon Mart and a range of reputed educational institutes. The area, launched by Nakheel in 2002, is well known for its signature low rise country-themed clusters. Conveniently located in the Al Warsan region, International City sprawls over 800 hectares (around 8 million sq. m. ) sharing borders with a few popular neighbourhoods like Silicon Oasis and Academic City. One of the biggest benefits of living in International City is that it offers you a multicultural community lifestyle while keeping the price tags modest. It is most ideal for anyone looking to settle in closely-knit communities. In this area guide, you will find a detailed overview of what the development has to offer.

description: AX CAPITAL Real Estate is offering to the market this elegant, spacious, and fully equipped 1-bedroom apartment in Princess Tower Marina. PROPERTY FEATURES:- Fully Upgraded- Spacious- Huge Balcony- Fully Furnished- High floor- Freshly maintained- Built-in wardrobes- Near Tram Station- BUA: 861.65 sq ft- Designated parking spaceAMENITIES:- 24-Hour security- Temperature-controlled swimming pool and jacuzzi- Health club- Gym and fitness facilities - Car parking- High-speed elevatorsNEARBY AMENITIES:- Metro Station, Tram, and Bus Station - Shopping Malls- Supermarkets - Hospitals - Clinics- Reference No. axcView Contact DetailABOUT Princess Tower:At 414 meters the Princess Tower holds the world record for the world's tallest residential building. It is roughly equivalent in height to the Empire State Building in New York. It was originally to be named Al Ameera Tower but the English translation, Princess Tower, was chosen instead.  Princess Tower was originally planned to be just 90 stories and the height was purely a means to maximize the profit on a relatively small plot of land. It was only later into the design process that the developers realized a potential word record was within reach, so the tower was re-designed at the last minute to allow for a further 11 floors. The tower is positioned slightly closer to the sea than its direct neighbors. That was done to maximize the sea views for the side apartments and explains why it appears off-center on its podium. AX CAPITAL was built upon a desire to create a real estate agency of the modern era where the customer is central to everything we do. Nestled within the serene and sought-after Ruba neighborhood, this exquisite 3-bedroom townhouse offers a blend of modern comfort and luxurious living. Upon entering, you are greeted by a spacious and well-lit living area, ideal for entertaining guests or enjoying cozy family evenings. The open-plan layout seamlessly connects the living room to the dining area and kitchen, creating a sense of fluidity and openness. Large windows throughout the townhouse flood the space with natural light, highlighting the elegant finishes and contemporary design. Upstairs, the townhouse boasts three generously sized bedrooms, each offering tranquility and comfort. The master bedroom features an en-suite bathroom and built-in wardrobes, providing both convenience and luxury. The additional bedrooms are perfect for children, guests, or as versatile spaces for a home office or hobby room. Schedule a viewing today and discover why Ruba in Arabian Ranches 3 is the perfect place to call home in Dubai.

The building is developed by Middle East Development LLC which also launched a few more towers in Dubai Sports City. Red Residence Dubai Sports City has three levels below ground and 20 floors above the ground. It also has a ground floor featuring a marbled reception and elevators. Construction of the building began in 2009 and it was completed in 2015. Hence, you can expect fairly new and ready to move-in apartments. Most importantly, the building is designed and constructed according to Green Building International Standards. The innovative technique reduces electricity consumption and helps preserve the natural environment. Home to popular sporting venues, including the Dubai International Stadium and Els Club, Dubai Sports City is a treat for all sports fans. description: Welcome to the world of bespoke Real Estate within the illustrious Dubai Marina. ABOUT INTERNATIONAL CITY DUBAIInternational City is one of the most affordable housing areas of Dubai’s ever-expanding real estate market. According to Bayut’s Annual Dubai Rental Report 2023, investing in apartments is a popular option with the best rental yield recorded. Investors and end-users can browse the sales transaction analysis for apartments in International City recorded by DLD over the past 12 months. Besides affordable accommodation, residents enjoy various perks of living in Dubai International City. They have access to the grand Dragon Mart and a range of reputed educational institutes. The area, launched by Nakheel in 2002, is well known for its signature low rise country-themed clusters. Conveniently located in the Al Warsan region, International City sprawls over 800 hectares (around 8 million sq. m. ) sharing borders with a few popular neighbourhoods like Silicon Oasis and Academic City. One of the biggest benefits of living in International City is that it offers you a multicultural community lifestyle while keeping the price tags modest. It is most ideal for anyone looking to settle in closely-knit communities. In this area guide, you will find a detailed overview of what the development has to offer.
